description.value:
Psychic magic flows through you when you attain a peaceful mental state. Regular meditation expands your mind, allowing new powers to develop.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2s198jpks0pvimjf]{Telempathic Projection} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ow4t1zox6dtybgji]{Silence} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7no45vnykqt1azc8]{Mantle Of Calm} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f0o357a1halsvm4p]{Daze, Mass} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8hhy7qitegvb7a4]{Serenity} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.21yha04trfhj0ehd]{Psychic Surgery} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{Mind Blank} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{Euphoric Tranquility} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{Time Stop} (18th).
